Body:
"""Test the translate function"""
for (ra1, dec1), (r, theta), (ra2, dec2) in [((0, 0), (1, 0), (0, 1)), ((45,
    89.75), (0.5, 0), (225, 89.75)), ((12, -45), (-1, 180), (12, -44))]:
    ans = at.translate(ra1, dec1, r, theta)
    assert_almost_equal(ans, (ra2, dec2), err_msg=
        '{0:5.2f},{1:5.2f} -> {2:g},{3:g} -> {4:5.2f},{5:5.2f} != {6:g},{7:g}'
        .format(ra1, dec1, r, theta, ra2, dec2, *ans))
